title: Customizations for Wayward
description: A file containing new customization options for Wayward.

hair-colors.description: An array of colors that will be used as swatches in the game. Valid formats are: `#RGB` and `#RRGGBB`

skin-colors.description: An array of colors that will be used as swatches in the game. Valid formats are: `#RGB` and `#RRGGBB`

hair-styles.description: An array of hairstyles. An entry can be either a name, wherein the path it is loaded from will be `static/image/hairstyle/${name}.png`, or an object containing its name and the path to load from.

name.description: The name of the hairstyle. Has no effect in-game, only used internally.

imagePath.description: The path of the hairstyle. Example: `specialHairstyles/Pigtails` would load `specialHairstyles/Pigtails.png`
